value.title: What is Power BI Gateway? Do You Need it to Connect to On-Premise Data? Can You Avoid Using One?
value.excerpt: Power BI Gateway acts as a bridge to let PowerBI.com (Cloud) connect to your On-Premise (Local) Data Sources ‚Äì like local Excel Files or a local SQL Server.   Watch our complete video series on Power BI Gateways: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7GQQXV5Z8edw57_eLqD9By5mzxIqxSJ1 1. What is a Power

value.title: Combine Multiple or All Sheets from an Excel File into a Power BI solution Using Power Query Dynamic
value.excerpt: Combining multiple files from one folder is already supported built-in through the graphical interface of Power Query when use you Get Data from Folder.
